feed.title: Workout Tracker Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Workout Tracker: v0.13.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add support for submitting workouts via API by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/116
  • Allow admins to manage some application-wide settings by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/117
  • Detect workouts without any GPS points by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/119
  • Fix the graph async in the workout statistics by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/121
  • Show the totals/records for the selected user by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/122
  • Make the whole pill containing the username clickable by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/123

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/compare/v0.13.3...v0.13.4

entry.title: New release for Workout Tracker: v0.14.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • added german translations by @bbbutch in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/124
  • Update npm packages by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/125
  • workout type golfing added by @bbbutch in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/126
  • Replace chart.js with apexcharts by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/128

New Contributors

  • @bbbutch made their first contribution in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/124

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/compare/v0.13.4...v0.14.0

entry.title: New release for Workout Tracker: v0.14.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Automatically use most popular workout in totals by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/130
  • Add per-user option to display full dates instead of relative dates by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/131

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/compare/v0.14.0...v0.14.1

entry.title: New release for Workout Tracker: v0.14.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Create fr.json by @DavidHenryThoreau in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/132
  • Add French language code by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/133

New Contributors

  • @DavidHenryThoreau made their first contribution in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/132

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/compare/v0.14.1...v0.14.2

entry.title: New release for Workout Tracker: v0.14.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Improve docs for Docker, add non-root explanation by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/138
  • Update fr.json by @DavidHenryThoreau in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/142
  • Improve the creation of a user profile by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/144

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/compare/v0.14.2...v0.14.3
